mapper.select: select b.role_name as roleName from uni_camel_user_role t LEFT JOIN uni_camel_role b ON t.role_id = b.role_id WHERE t.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select e.resources_name as resourcesName from uni_camel_user_role t LEFT JOIN uni_camel_role_auth b ON t.role_id = b.role_id LEFT JOIN uni_camel_resources e ON b.resources_id = e.resources_id WHERE t.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
